snippet: A three-day conference in St. Louis is expected to draw 1,200 innovators to collaborate across diverse science and technology fields.
abstract: Pentagon will host three-day conference in St Louis in order to strengthen ties with American scientists and engineers; conference is brainchild of Arati Prabhakar, Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency head, and is part of Pentagon's effort to tap into Silicon Valley talent pool.
lead_paragraph: A three-day conference in St. Louis is expected to draw 1,200 innovators to collaborate across diverse science and technology fields.

headline.main: Conference Aims to Bridge the Divide Between the Pentagon and Silicon Valley
headline.print_headline: Conference Aims to Bridge the Divide Between the Pentagon and Silicon Valley

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
